name: 數位音樂與聲音合成之基礎程式設計
goals: Able to understand the basic principles of digital audio, and use chucK to perform simple audio synthesis.
Able to handle MIDI data by Python, and analyze or generate music by the algorithm.
Able to produce an auditory-visual interactive project by utilizing  Scratch.
Able to search current applications of digital music online.
Able to search online or attend exhibitions about digital music, and appreciate those in various cultures of different countries.
